XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="/:form" Method="POST" Call="createFormField"/> <Route Url="/:form" Method="PUT" Call="updateFormField"/> <Route Url="/:form/:field" Method="DELETE" Call="deleteFormField"/> </Routes>

Method.name: createFormField
Method.Description: Добавить поле в форме URL запроса: POST /form/field/:form Тело: { "name":"services", "collection":"", "displayName":"Ресурс", "type":"%Library.String", "required": "0" }
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK set sc = ##class(Form.Info).formExistsStatus(class) return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set obj = %request.Content
set name = obj.name set type = obj.type set collection = obj.collection set displayName = obj.displayName set required = obj.required
set sc = ##class(Form.Property).addClassProperty(class, name, type, collection, displayName, required)
return sc

Method.name: updateFormField
Method.Description: Изменить поле в форме URL запроса: PUT /form/field/:form Тело: { "name":"services", "collection":"", "displayName":"Ресурс", "type":"%String", "required": "0" }
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK set sc = ##class(Form.Info).formExistsStatus(class) return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set obj = %request.Content
set name = obj.name set type = obj.type set collection = obj.collection set displayName = obj.displayName set required = obj.required
set sc = ##class(Form.Property).modifyClassProperty(class, name, type, collection, displayName, required)
return sc

Method.name: deleteFormField
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK set sc = ##class(Form.Info).formExistsStatus(class) return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set sc = ##class(Form.Property).deleteClassProperty(class, property) return sc
